study_info.target_population: Adults with moderate to severe RA

intervention.mechanism: Selectively inhibits JAK1 and JAK3 kinases

population.inclusion: Age 18-70 years; ACR criteria for RA; Disease duration ≥6 months; Active disease with DAS28-CRP ≥3.2; Inadequate response to MTX
population.exclusion: Serious infections; Malignancy within 5 years; Severe hepatic impairment; Current or planned pregnancy

endpoints.secondary: ACR50/70 response rates; DAS28-CRP; HAQ-DI; Radiographic progression
endpoints.outcome_tools: ACR criteria; DAS28-CRP score; HAQ-DI questionnaire; X-ray assessment

special_considerations: Prior biologics allowed if discontinued ≥8 weeks before screening
